column5: ma mbepɔw apem asen wɔ w’enyim;"

column3: na ogya no ma esu hur: ama w’atamfo eehu wo dzin
column4: na amanaman ho aapopo wɔ w’enyim!"

column2: "Ber a eyɛɛ ndzɛmba huhuhuhu a hɛn enyi annda kwan no

column4: enyiwa so nnhun Nyankopɔn bi ka wo ho a odzi dwuma ma nyia ɔtweɔn no no."

column2: "Ɔwo na ihyia nyia ɔdze enyigye yɛ ndzeyɛtsenenee
column3: hɔn a wɔkaa wo wɔ w’akwan mu: hwɛ
column5: na hɛn yɛyɛɛ bɔn: bɔn mu na yɛatsena dadaada yi

column2: "Na hɛn nyinara ayeyɛ dɛ obi a no ho egu fi
column3: na hɛn tsenenee nyinara tse dɛ atar fi pɔtɔɔ: na hɛn nyinara yɛpa dɛ ahataw; na hɛn emumuyɛ soa hɛn kɔ dɛ mframa."

column2: "Na obi nnyi hɔ a ɔbɔ wo dzin
column3: anaa okenyan noho a obosuo wo mu: na ɔwo eyi w’enyim ehuntsa hɛn
column4: na enam hɛn emumuyɛ do ama yɛahyew."
ɔwoara nye hɛn egya; awendɛtse no nye hɛn
column5: na ɔwemfo no nye woara; na hɛn nyinara yɛyɛ wo nsaano edwuma."

column4: eso mma nnkaa emumuyɛ daa: to enyi hwɛ

column2: "Hɛn fi krɔnkrɔn fɛɛfɛw mbrɛ hɛn egyanom yii wo ayɛw wɔ mu no
column3: wɔdze ogya ahyew no; na hɛn afɛɛfɛdze nyinara ayɛ amamfo."
aso iyinom ntsi ebɛkam woho? Aso ebɛyɛ komm
